code: var Swal=require('sweetalert2');var invalidFields=function invalidFields(message){return Swal.fire({title:'Invalid fields',icon:'error',confirmButtonText:message});};var wrongCredentials=function wrongCredentials(message){return Swal.fire({title:'Invalid fields',icon:'error',confirmButtonText:message});};var signUpSuccess=function signUpSuccess(){return Swal.fire({title:'Signed Up',icon:'success',timer:1000,showConfirmButton:false});};var signInSuccess=function signInSuccess(){return Swal.fire({title:'Welcome back',icon:'success',timer:1000,showConfirmButton:false});};var formImageIssue=function formImageIssue(msg){return Swal.fire({title:msg,icon:'error',timer:1500,showConfirmButton:false});};var itemUploaded=function itemUploaded(msg){return Swal.fire({title:msg,text:"redirecting...",icon:'success',timer:2500,showConfirmButton:false});};var loggedOut=function loggedOut(){return Swal.fire({title:"Logged out",icon:'error',timer:1000,showConfirmButton:false});};var confirmLogout=function confirmLogout(setAuthenticated){return Swal.fire({text:"Logout?",icon:'warning',showCancelButton:true,confirmButtonColor:'#3085d6',cancelButtonColor:'#d33',confirmButtonText:'Yes'}).then(function(result){if(result.isConfirmed){setAuthenticated(false);localStorage.clear();loggedOut();}});};var displayFormDoctorImage=function displayFormDoctorImage(image){Swal.fire({title:'Please make sure to follow our image instructions.',text:"This is to make sure we're able to help you the best we can.",imageUrl:image,imageWidth:300,imageHeight:240,imageAlt:'Instructions Alert'});};var redirecting=function redirecting(){return Swal.fire({title:'Redirecting',icon:'success',timer:2000,showConfirmButton:false});};export{invalidFields,wrongCredentials,signUpSuccess,signInSuccess,itemUploaded,formImageIssue,confirmLogout,displayFormDoctorImage,redirecting};
